00019 QWidget* EnvIdentifiersDelegate::createEditor( QWidget* parent, 
00020                                                                                           const QStyleOptionViewItem&,
00021                                                                                           const QModelIndex& ) const {
00022 
00023         QLineEdit* editor = new QLineEdit(parent);
00024         connect(editor, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00025           this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()));
00026         return editor;
00027 }
00028 
00029 void EnvIdentifiersDelegate::setEditorData( QWidget* editor, 
00030                                                                                    const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00031 
00032         QLineEdit* lineEditor = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00033         QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00034         lineEditor->setText(text);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void EnvIdentifiersDelegate::setModelData( QWidget* editor,
00038                                                                                   QAbstractItemModel* model, 
00039                                                                                   const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00040 
00041         QLineEdit* lineEditor = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00042         QString text = lineEditor->text();
00043         model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00044 }
00045 
00046 void EnvIdentifiersDelegate::commitAndCloseEditor() {
00047         QLineEdit* editor = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(sender());
00048         emit commitData(editor);
00049         emit closeEditor(editor);
00050 }
